record.name: PC Backup
record.description: The PC Backup service provides a secure reliable means of protecting data stored locally on Windows based client PC's, offering a fast and easy method of data restoration while being relatively transparent to the user.
record.detailedDescription: The PC Backup service provides a secure reliable means of protecting data stored locally on Windows based client PC's, offering a fast and easy method of data restoration while being relatively transparent to the user.
